post_detail.description:
Challenge:

Pigs-in-a-blanket, cocktail wieners, kilted sausages: Hot dogs can be very popular at a party. Party City's agency of record Zimmerman challenged ClickFireMedia to create an online haunted house populated entirely by animated hot dogs in costume.

Execution:

The resulting website brings together 3D animated characters, Facebook Connect, interactivity, viral video, and a link to buy the real costumes from Party City. The two companies worked in constant collaboration.
post_detail.title: Halloweenies
